name: Political Discussion Simulator!
description:
After months of radio silence, you're finally reuniting with your old college friends tonight, to share a drink at a bar in the city. But a good conversation quickly turns sour when the impending election is brought up, and it seems not everyone agrees our next President. Not only that, but... you don't care about politics. At all.

Political Discussion Simulator! is a short and sweet comedy game where you manoeuvre through a difficult conversation, trying to mediate between two sides, hopefully without losing any friends in the process. 

Please note this is a work of satire, and is purely intended to entertain.
